name: Super Bomberman 2 (Fan-Made)
description:
Hey guys this is the first and one of the mini-projects I did to learn a bit of coding during last year.

I didn't try to reproduce exactly Super Bomberman 2 for SNES but just some of the main mechanics of Bomberman games (So there are mixed assets in it from other Bomberman games and stuff I found around).

Anyway, I hope you can have fun with it!

Any feedback is really appreciated!

KEYBOARD INPUTS IN THE MENU:

  • ARROW KEYS to move
  • ENTER to select

KEYBOARD INPUTS IN-GAME:

Player 1:

  • WASD to move
  • SPACEBAR to place bombs

Player 2:

  • ARROW KEYS to move
  • CTRL to place bombs

Player 3:

  • NUMERIC KEYPAD (8,5,4,6) to move
  • PLUS ON NUMERIC KEYPAD to place bombs

Player 4:

  • IKJL to move
  • P to place bombs
